tool_description: Analyzes checkout funnel performance, identifies bottlenecks, and tracks conversion rates across different checkout stages.

device_filter.description: Device types to include in analysis

include_error_analysis.description: Whether to include error pattern analysis

error_messages: Invalid date range: End date must be after start date
Invalid analysis period: Date range cannot exceed 90 days
Invalid user_segment: Must be a recognized segment or 'all'
Invalid device_filter: Must contain valid device types [mobile, tablet, desktop]
Invalid checkout_stages: Must contain valid stage identifiers
Insufficient data: Analysis period contains insufficient transaction data
usage: Analyze checkout performance by specifying analysis period and checkout stages. Optionally filter by user segment and device types for targeted analysis.

overall_conversion_rate.description: Overall checkout completion rate as percentage

stage_conversion_rates.description: Conversion rates for each checkout stage

average_completion_time.description: Average time to complete checkout in seconds
